14 # Creates the SimpleActionClient, passing the type of the action

17 
24 
25 class Conveyor_Remote_Client():
26 
27  def __init__(self,ns):
28  self.loaded = False
29  self.name = ns
30  self.client_reload = ActionClient(str(self.name+'reload'))
31  self.status_listener = rospy.Subscriber(str(ns+"loaded"), Bool, self.callback)
32 
33  def callback(self,data):
34  self.loaded = data.data
35 
36  def reload_conveyor(self):
37  if not self.loaded:
38  return self.client_reload.move(x=-40, y=0, z=0)
39  else:
40  return False
41 
42  def set_speed(self):
43  print("select pump state True or False")
44  speed = float(input("speed [mm/s]: "))
45  speed = speed*40/100
46  rospy.wait_for_service(str(self.name+'set_speed'))
47  print("connected")
48  try:
49  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.name+'set_speed'), set_float)
50  received_response = service_object(speed)
51  print("service called")
52  return received_response.success
53  except:
54  print("service call failed")
55  return(False)
56 
57  def stop(self):
58  rospy.wait_for_service(str(self.name+'stop'))
59  print("connected")
60  rospy.wait_for_service(str(self.name+'set_speed'))
61  print("connected")
62  try:
63  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.name+'set_speed'), set_float)
64  received_response = service_object(0)
65  print("service called")
66  return received_response.success
67  except:
68  print("service call failed")
69  return(False)
70 
71 
72 if __name__ == "__main__":
73  rospy.init_node('conveyor_client', anonymous=True)
74  try:
75  ns = rospy.get_param('~ns_client')
76  except:
77  ns = "conveyor0/"
78  server = Conveyor_Remote_Client(ns)
79  time.sleep(9)
80  try:
81  while True:
82  if server.client_reload.status == 0:
83  print("Options:")
84  print("1: reload")
85  print("2: set speed")
86  print("3: stop")
87  try:
88  option = int(input(">> "))
89  except:
90  option = 0
91 
92  if option == 1:
93  print(server.reload_conveyor())
94 
95  elif option == 2:
96  print(server.set_speed())
97 
98  elif option == 3:
99  print(server.stop())
100 
101  else:
102  time.sleep(2)
103  print("waiting for conveyor to be ready...")
104  except KeyboardInterrupt:
105  pass
